anl.verdi.plot.config

Class PlotConfigurationIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.xml.sax.ext.DefaultHandler2
        • anl.verdi.plot.config.PlotConfigurationIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class PlotConfigurationIO
extends org.xml.sax.ext.DefaultHandler2
    Interface for classes that represent a plot configuration and can save and load the configuration data.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    Nick Collier

      • loadConfiguration

        public PlotConfiguration loadConfiguration(java.io.File file)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the configuration data from the specified file into a PlotConfiguration and returns that configuration.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the loaded PlotConfiguration
        Throws:
